name: Hisshou Pachinko * Pachi-Slot Kouryaku Series Portable Vol. 2: CR Evangelion: Hajimari no Fukuin
overview: Hisshou Pachinko * Pachi-Slot Kouryaku Series Portable Vol. 2: CR Evangelion - Hajimari no Fukuin is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2010.
